description: Unique identifier for a configurable option used by the system’s double-click behavior on a customized field.
Identifier of the specific customized field/column to which this option applies within the configuration.
The stored value applied or displayed for this option on the target field; supports numeric or text content.
Username or service account that created this configuration entry.
Timestamp when this configuration entry was created.
Username or service account that last updated this configuration entry.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this configuration entry.
Identifier of the customization set or context that groups the field and its related options.
Internal name of the field this option targets, such as a user-defined or standard attribute.
Free-text description or label explaining the option’s purpose; may be blank.
